description:
It is a treat to know how things work around you. WagMob has brought you an interesting Visual Science Experiments app for Teens. Be ready to zoom into lots of fun and findings with your friends together! 
Put on a white coat, collect household items and get started right away. Some experiments can be done in the kitchen or near your bedroom window.  Make sure you collect all the things before you begin. Each experiment includes an insight into the science behind it. 
So, why should children have all the fun? Parents can join in too. 
Features: 
15  fun science experiments to explore at home.
Clear, step-by-step instructions
Learn the scientific insight behind each result 
Learn how to make a rainbow, projector, magnetic car, invisible ink and more.
Quizzes to make your know-how more solid 
App is continuously updated based on your feedback. Your 100% satisfaction is guaranteed.
App Tools include search.
What is unique about WagMob apps? 
 1) A touch friendly, quick reference app, which is always in your pocket and always works (no data connection required).
  2) A companion app for on-the-go, bite-sized learning. 
 3) Offers value for money (A lifetime of free updates). 
 4) Over 250,000 paying customers from 155 countries.

Our Vision: Provide on-the-go references that enable our customers to refer, learn and remember; easy to learn, more engaging and truly complete.
Our Mission: A WagMob app in every pocket.
Please write to us. We would love to improve this app.
